#include<stdio.h>
#include<malloc.h>
int main()
{
unsigned int n,i,j,res,max;
int t;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
	res=0;
	max=0;
scanf("%u",&n);
unsigned int *a=(unsigned int *)malloc(n*sizeof(unsigned int));
for(i=0;i<n;i++)scanf("%u",&a[i]);
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{
for(j=i;j<n;j++)
{if(max<a[i])
{
if(i!=j)
{
res=(a[i])&(a[j]);
if(max<res)max=res;
}}else break;
}
}
printf("%u\n",max);
free(a);
}
return 0;
}
